text: Ewald Follmann (28 January 1926 – 20 June 1990) was a German footballer who played for FC Nancy, Borussia Neunkirchen and the Saarland national team as a forward. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:1990 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:FC Nancy players Category:Borussia Neunkirchen players Category:Association football forwards Category:German expatriate footballers Category:German expatriate sportspeople in France Category:Expatriate footballers in France
title: Ewald Follmann
